ack.p: The AYAZAZI Research Team thanks our youth participants for all their contributions to this study. Thank you to the youth interviewers and retention officers, Nonhlonipho Bhengu, Sphamandla Gumbi, Thandeka Sithole, Leonard Letsoara, and Nomathemba Mathango. We also thank our international team of co-investigators, collaborators, and youth representatives, and acknowledge the Adolescent Community Advisory Boards for providing their expertise and guidance throughout the study. Individuals addressed above did not provide any financial support for this study.
